segments.text: I've been so tired recently . I've been trying , but I don't think I'm up to this job .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You need to take a break , maybe a vacation .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , yes , indeed . I've run out of steam . To be honest , I want to be in a different environment .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I don't want to be stuck in a rut . I want to move on .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . I want to get a better job .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Could you tell me why you want to quit ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I quit just because of the dissatisfying salary and the trouble in getting along with my colleagues .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , that's terrible . Do you want to get a higher salary in our company ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm afraid not . I've promised my girlfriend . We'll travel southwards to find a job that offers higher pay .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK , I'd like to say that I've really enjoyed working with you . However , I think you should work harder for your new job and then you can ask for higher pay .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thank you so much for your advice .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: And every best wish for your new job .
segments.speaker: S2
